seg.source: 记者在现场看到，一辆大型的货柜车车头在交警指挥下移靠在快车道上，货柜箱掉落在绿化道，路边被砸出一条2厘米深的坑。
seg.translation: At the site, reporters saw a large container tractor unit parking next to the fast lane under the direction of the traffic police. The container has fallen on the landscape lane, creating a pit 2-cm deep by the road side.
The reporter saw at the scene, a large container truck front in the traffic police under the direction of the fast lane, the container dropped in Green road, roadside was smashed a 2 cm deep pits.

At the scene, the head of a large container vehicle was seen moving under the direction of the traffic police and leaning against the express lane, the container box fell on a green road and a 2cm sinkhole was smashed on the side of the road.
